description: Reminds to update Serena's memory after modifying MOKAI business context, MCP configs, or critical system files. Non-blocking reminder shown after tool execution.

hooks.command: FILE="$CLAUDE_TOOL_FILE_PATH"; PATTERNS=('*/01-areas/business/mokai/*' '*/.claude/instructions/*' '*/.claude/agents/*' '*/.claude/commands/*' '*/.mcp.json'); SHOULD_REMIND=false; for pattern in "${PATTERNS[@]}"; do if [[ "$FILE" == $pattern ]]; then SHOULD_REMIND=true; break; fi; done; if [[ "$SHOULD_REMIND" == true ]]; then (sleep 1 && echo "" && echo "ðŸ”„ Context file modified: $(basename "$FILE")" && echo "   After completion, consider running: /update-serena-memory" && echo "") >&2 & fi; exit 0
